extendedInfo.description: With this great app you can say "Merry Christmas" in any language. It is a great way to make someone smile on a special occasion. Because it has a share feature, you can also send a "Merry Christmas" to a friend by e-mail, social networks and so on.Merry Christmas!Features:- Over 90 languages- Recorded voice teaches you to get it right- Share with friends- Search- Sort countries by population or name- Loads of funHave a great day and may your holidays be even greater!
